about_the_game:
Pick up your weapons, plant diverse plants, confront the constantly attacking monsters, and protect the holy tree behind you!

Grasp the weapon in your hand, defeat the incoming monsters to obtain fertilizer that you can plant different plants. Also, using the fruits of plants and the holy power provided by the holy tree can help you build Fortification!

As time passing, the monsters will become more stronger! You need to use all your resources to defeat them until the last day come.At that day,you need to defeat the boss andd win the game!

However, may be you can constantly explore deeper plots, perhaps finding the true reason for exploring the magical attack on the Holy Tree?

Main features:

·This is a game that combines action and tower defense elements

·Encounter different monsters at a fixed time period

·There will be continuous more updates in the future

name: 树根守护者RootKeeper

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (64 bit) or Newer (64 bit) Windows OS
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10 compliant video card
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Unknown Warrior, pick up your weapons, plant a variety of plants, resist the surging monsters, and protect the Holy Tree!
